desc.en: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.thai: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.ko: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: [USERNAME]老師為了求助而前往格黑娜學園和三一學園。另一方面，受到開路邊攤的柴關老闆招待拉麵的便利屋一行人，決定幫助對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往格黑娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往格黑娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往格黑娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.thai: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.ko: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_tw: 接受[USERNAME]老師請求的陽奈和格黑娜風紀委員會一行人，助阿拜多斯對策委員會一臂之力與PMC士兵交戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的日奈和格黑娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的阳奈和格黑娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的阳奈和格黑娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。

desc.en: Sensei came to Gehenna and hoped to have a talk with Hina, but got intercepted by Iori. Iori said it was impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei did it without a second thought. Iori cursed at Sensei and they happened to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asked Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentioned about the licking stuff and Hina was in great shock immediately.
desc.jp: Sensei came to Gehenna and hoped to have a talk with Hina, but got intercepted by Iori. Iori said it was impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei did it without a second thought. Iori cursed at Sensei and they happened to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asked Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentioned about the licking stuff and Hina was in great shock immediately.
desc.thai: Sensei came to Gehenna and hoped to have a talk with Hina, but got intercepted by Iori. Iori said it was impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei did it without a second thought. Iori cursed at Sensei and they happened to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asked Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentioned about the licking stuff and Hina was in great shock immediately.
desc.ko: Sensei came to Gehenna and hoped to have a talk with Hina, but got intercepted by Iori. Iori said it was impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei did it without a second thought. Iori cursed at Sensei and they happened to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asked Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentioned about the licking stuff and Hina was in great shock immediately.
desc.zh_tw: 老師來到格黑娜，希望見到陽奈，但被伊織攔下，表示除非舔她的腳——老師二話不說直接跪舔。伊織對老師破口大罵，正好遇到陽奈。陽奈見老師跪地便讓老師起來，然而伊織不知為何提到了舔腳的事，陽奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到日奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到日奈。日奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，日奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。

desc.en: Hifumi reported Sensei's request to the Tea Party. Nagisa, the president of the Tea Party, designated Hifumi to aid them with the students learning towed howitzers, after considering the potential interference to the signing of the treaty that PMC might cause.
desc.jp: Hifumi reported Sensei's request to the Tea Party. Nagisa, the president of the Tea Party, designated Hifumi to aid them with the students learning towed howitzers, after considering the potential interference to the signing of the treaty that PMC might cause.

desc.zh_tw: 日步美向茶會報告了老師的請求，茶會的渚在思考後決定為了削減PMC可能的潛在對條約簽署的影響，委派日步美帶牽引式榴彈炮的學生前去支援。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日富美向茶会报告了老师的请求，茶会的渚在思考后决定为了削减PMC可能的潜在对条约签署的影响，委派日富美带牵引式榴弹炮的学生前去支援。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 日步美向茶会报告了老师的请求，茶会的渚在思考后决定为了削减PMC可能的潜在对条约签署的影响，委派日步美带牵引式榴弹炮的学生前去支援。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日步美向茶会报告了老师的请求，茶会的渚在思考后决定为了削减PMC可能的潜在对条约签署的影响，委派日步美带牵引式榴弹炮的学生前去支援。

desc.en: Master Shiba opened a ramen cart at the side of the road and met the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gave four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still held concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru said that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.jp: Master Shiba opened a ramen cart at the side of the road and met the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gave four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still held concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru said that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.

Yet with a fair budget, Aru said that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.zh_tw: 柴大將在路邊開了個小攤子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一樣，老闆給四個人盛了一大碗麵，只不過這次一人一碗。吃完後，佳代子對是否要參與戰鬥還有些疑慮，不過因為委託費給夠，亞瑠表示不得不去——不過仍然是強裝的罷了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，阿露表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，亚瑠表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，亚瑠表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.

desc.zh_tw: 柴大將是一位在阿拜多斯校區附近經營著一個名叫“柴犬拉麵”的餐廳老闆，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: After seeing the Problem Solver off, Master Shiba suddenly realized he forgot to say something: It takes nothing to fail, it's okay to try it again.
desc.jp: After seeing the Problem Solver off, Master Shiba suddenly realized he forgot to say something: It takes nothing to fail, it's okay to try it again.
desc.thai: After seeing the Problem Solver off, Master Shiba suddenly realized he forgot to say something: It takes nothing to fail, it's okay to try it again.

desc.zh_tw: 柴大將走後突然意識到忘說了什麼：失敗也沒什麼，重來就好了；店鋪，最重要的還是它的顧客。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将走后突然意识到忘说了什么：失败也没什么，重来就好了；店铺，最重要的还是它的顾客。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.ko: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
